General.Name: Lin Horn Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Lin Horn Technology Co., Ltd. produces and sells multilayer printed circuit boards in Taiwan, China, rest of Asia, the United States, Europe, and internationally. It offers computer peripherals, such as mother boards/server boards/VGA cards/storage systems; and automotive products, including control systems/dashboards/multimedia systems/others. The company also provides netcom products comprising wired and wireless high-frequency communication products; various consumer electronics; and other products for various industrial applications. Lin Horn Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Chiayi, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 6, Chung Shan Road, Chiayi, Taiwan, 621
